languages.text: "О, не сомневайтесь, займемся!" {n}Губернатор делает жест охране.{/n} "Увести подозреваемого. И найдите дежурного экзекутора — он должен был уже закончить с допросом пленных мятежников".

"Oh, we will, I assure you!" {n}The governor gestures to the guards.{/n} "Take the suspect away. And find the executioner on duty. He should be done with interrogating the captured insurgents by now."
languages.original_text: "О, не сомневайтесь, займемся!" {n}Губернатор делает жест охране.{/n} "Увести подозреваемого. И найдите дежурного экзекутора — он должен был уже закончить с допросом пленных мятежников".

traits.locale_text: "Oh, we will, I assure you!" {n}The governor gestures to the guards.{/n} "Take the suspect away. And find the corporal punishment duty officer. He should be done with interrogating captured insurgents by now."

"Oh, we will, I assure you!" {n}The governor gestures to the guards.{/n} "Take the suspect away. And find the corporal punishment duty officer. He should be done with interrogating captured insurgents by now."

"Oh, we will, I assure you!" {n}The governor gestures to the guards.{/n} "Take the suspect away. And find the executioner on duty. He should be done with interrogating the captured insurgents by now."

"Oh, we will, I assure you!" {n}The governor gestures to the guards.{/n} "Take the suspect away. And find the executioner on duty. He should be done with interrogating the captured insurgents by now."

languages.text: "Oh, das werden wir, das versichere ich Euch!" {n}Der Gouverneur gibt den Wachen ein Zeichen.{/n} "Führt den Verdächtigen weg. Und findet den diensthabenden Henker. Er sollte das Verhör der gefangen genommenen Aufständischen inzwischen abgeschlossen haben."
languages.original_text: "Oh, we will, I assure you!" {n}The governor gestures to the guards.{/n} "Take the suspect away. And find the executioner on duty. He should be done with interrogating the captured insurgents by now."

traits.locale_text: "Oh, das werden wir, das versichere ich Euch!" {n}Der Gouverneur gibt den Wachen ein Zeichen.{/n} "Führt den Verdächtigen weg. Und findet den diensthabenden Henker. Er sollte das Verhör der gefangen genommenen Aufständischen inzwischen abgeschlossen haben."

languages.text: « Oh, nous le ferons, je peux vous l'assurer ! » {n}Le gouverneur fait un geste à l'attention des gardes.{/n} « Emmenez le suspect. Et trouvez le bourreau de garde. Il devrait avoir fini d'interroger les insurgés capturés. »
languages.original_text: "Oh, we will, I assure you!" {n}The governor gestures to the guards.{/n} "Take the suspect away. And find the executioner on duty. He should be done with interrogating the captured insurgents by now."

traits.locale_text: « Oh, nous le ferons, je peux vous l'assurer ! » {n}Le gouverneur fait un geste à l'attention des gardes.{/n} « Emmenez le suspect. Et trouvez le bourreau de garde. Il devrait avoir fini d'interroger les insurgés capturés. »

languages.text: “噢，我们会的，我向您保证！”{n}总督向卫兵打了个手势。{/n}“把嫌疑犯带到当值的行刑官那里。之前俘虏来的叛乱分子，他应该已经审完了。”
languages.original_text: "Oh, we will, I assure you!" {n}The governor gestures to the guards.{/n} "Take the suspect away. And find the executioner on duty. He should be done with interrogating the captured insurgents by now."

traits.locale_text: “噢，我们会的，我向您保证！”{n}总督向卫兵打了个手势。{/n}“把嫌疑犯带到当值的行刑官那里。之前俘虏来的叛乱分子，他应该已经审完了。”

languages.text: 「そうします、必ずや！」{n}総督は衛兵に合図を送る。{/n}「容疑者を連行して、勤務中の死刑執行人を探し出せ。今頃、捕獲した反乱者の尋問を終えているはずだ」
languages.original_text: "Oh, we will, I assure you!" {n}The governor gestures to the guards.{/n} "Take the suspect away. And find the executioner on duty. He should be done with interrogating the captured insurgents by now."

traits.locale_text: 「そうします、必ずや！」{n}総督は衛兵に合図を送る。{/n}「容疑者を連行して、勤務中の死刑執行人を探し出せ。今頃、捕獲した反乱者の尋問を終えているはずだ」

languages.text: «¡Oh, lo haremos, eso seguro!». {n}El gobernador hace un gesto a los guardias.{/n} «Llévense al sospechoso. Y encuentren al verdugo de turno. Ya debería haber terminado de interrogar a los insurgentes capturados».
languages.original_text: "Oh, we will, I assure you!" {n}The governor gestures to the guards.{/n} "Take the suspect away. And find the executioner on duty. He should be done with interrogating the captured insurgents by now."

traits.locale_text: «¡Oh, lo haremos, eso seguro!». {n}El gobernador hace un gesto a los guardias.{/n} «Llévense al sospechoso. Y encuentren al verdugo de turno. Ya debería haber terminado de interrogar a los insurgentes capturados».

languages.text: "Araştıracağız, hiç şüpheniz olmasın!" {n}Vali, muhafızlara işaret ediyor.{/n} "Şüpheliyi götürün. Görev başındaki celladı da bulun. Ele geçirilen asileri sorgulama işini bitirmiştir artık."
languages.original_text: "Oh, we will, I assure you!" {n}The governor gestures to the guards.{/n} "Take the suspect away. And find the executioner on duty. He should be done with interrogating the captured insurgents by now."
